Black Box Testing
=================
a.Functional testing

Testing each and every component thoroughly against the requirement specification.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth : 2

b.Integration Testing

Testing the data flow between two modules.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth : 2
   
c.System Testing

It is a end to end testing where the test enviornament similar to the production enviornment.
